sections.heading: or referees; appointment; duty
sections.text: Upon entering such judgment the court shall appoint a referee or referees, not exceeding three in number, to make partition into the requisite number of shares.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 812, p. 539;Laws 1905, c. 178, ยง 1, p. 671;R.S.1913, ยง 8295;C.S.1922, ยง 9248;C.S.1929,
